topic: Representation of a solar sceen in radiance
body:
Dear users,
Happy New Year. I am looking for the best way to represent a gray semi transparent solar screen in radiance. Would it be to represent is as a sheet of glass with the total light transmissions or?The screen is placed on the exterior side of the window and has a solartransmission of 6%, light transmission of 6% and an openness factor of 4%.The colour rendering index is 100.The total light transmissions of the screen and glass is 4%.


Any input is appreciated.
Best regardsPer Haugaard
